history.text: How did you like the movie?
I thought it was pretty good. I typically go more for Pixar movies, so I was a little surprised at how enjoyable I found this one.
Yes i enjoyed how the villan was the main character and then turned good.
Yeah I think having a grouch like that for the main character was a nice change for animated movies.
Steven tajat played Gru did amazing
Steve that played Gru did amazing!
Do you watch a lot of animated movies?
I do. Animated comedy is my favorite. How about you?
I really like all kinds of movies, and tend to go toward anything with good critic responses. That's why I checked this one out.
Did you know anything about this movie before watching it?
I agee. I see it has a huge famous cast
I noticed that in the movie even when the villain was being grumpy you can see his heart becoming soft
I like how they focus on some silly, mundane aspects of being a supervillain, like needing to get a loan from the Bank of Evil.
I liked when him and the girls went and rode the roller coaster in the movie! He also 1 prizes for the little girls when they couldn't I thought that was very sweet.
It was funny to see villains combating with each other to see who could be the best villain.
Did ypu agree with the ratings it got?
The metacritic score seems about right to me. I might have gone a little bit lower, just because I think other animated movies set the bar really high.
I was very pleased with a high rating. One of the best i had seen in awhile.
I do feel it shpuld have included the minons more
Since it was there break put movie.
I liked the sweet storyline of the girls warming up Gru's heart, I just didn't think it was as emotionally rewarding as some other movies.
The minions were definitely scene stealers.
They did a good job at making them super cute yet super funny as well.
Their light-hearted cuteness might have made it a little hard for the movie to get to my emotions more at the heartfelt scenes.
I think it was just a tiny bit more for kids than for families/everyone like some other animated movies have been.
I must say it was my 1st 3d movie and it was fun seeing the minons in 3d and I do agree with the emotional aspect you voiced
It makes me curious to find out the fate of all the characters and invest my time to this movie
The moon getting larger in the ship was a great visual gag.
Haha yes it was. I loved when the girls made the cute puns
And how the girl beds were rocket bombs
Do you usually check out critic reviews before picking a movie to watch, or how do you decide?
I honestly do not. However i like to afterwards to see if we have the same thoughts on the movie.
What do you check 0ut in a movie before you watch it?
I tend to side more with critics than audiences so I like having an idea of what the critics thought first. I also like to know who wrote and directed it, I think that's very important.
Awesome well thanks for the chat. Have a great day. I enjoyed our talk
